creator: swestbom@yahoo.com
text: I tried to download the binary but the zip file returned is the source version.

creator: hoju@visi.com
text:
Hmm... Did you look under jakarta-log4j-1.2.8/dist/lib within the archive?  The
zip file I downloaded from here had the log4j-1.2.8.jar there...
http://mirror2.telentente.com/pub/apache/dist/jakarta/log4j/binaries/jakarta-log4j-1.2.8.zip

Marking WFM.  Reopen if you can find a link pointing to a zip file with only
source and no binary.

Jake
